name: Chick'n'Doggo (Updated Version)
description:
Press X (or V) to play.

Chick'n'Doggo is a game I made as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2021 using Pico-8. I wanted to preserve the original jam version, which can be found here.

This is an updated version with some minor fixes, mostly regarding collision as well as some slightly adjusted controls (try holding the button). There's still more to be done, including the, perhaps not so minor, flaw of missing sound, so this version may be updated in the future.
